Control Name: Establishes Requirements for Vendor and Business Partner Engagements—The entity establishes specific requirements for a vendor and business partner engagement that includes (1) scope of services and product specifications, (2) roles and responsibilities, (3) compliance requirements, and (4) service levels.

control_attributes.Control: Establishes Requirements for Vendor and Business Partner Engagements—The entity establishes specific requirements for a vendor and business partner engagement that includes (1) scope of services and product specifications, (2) roles and responsibilities, (3) compliance requirements, and (4) service levels.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC9.2 The entity assesses and manages risks associated with vendors and business partners.
